ing: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or more to taste (optional)
des: "A quick and delicious drink that goes well on any day. You can even make ice pops out of this drink as a snack. Try lemon-lime soda in place of water for another variation. You can also add ice cubes if you want it colder and somewhat slushy."
ins: Blend watermelon, water, and sugar in a blender until smooth.
